details: When information is scattered across different teams, meetings, and codebases, I organize and map it all out. By creating clear documentation and structure, I help teams align their efforts, reduce misunderstandings, and catch potential flaws early in the process.
quote: One of my favorite things about working with Linda is how she just intuitively knows all of the things that are necessary for a long-term project to be successful and is very thorough in making sure those things are in place.
